values.title: Welcome to State University
values.hero_description: Join a community of scholars, innovators, and leaders. Our world-class faculty and cutting-edge facilities prepare you for success in an ever-changing world.
values.cta_description: Applications for Fall 2026 are now open. Take the first step toward your future today.

values.title: Computer Science
values.body:
Our Computer Science program prepares students for careers in software development, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and more. With state-of-the-art labs and industry partnerships, you'll gain hands-on experience with the latest technologies.

What You'll Learn

  • Programming fundamentals and advanced algorithms
  • Machine learning and artificial intelligence
  • Software engineering best practices
  • Database design and cloud computing

values.title: Psychology
values.body:
Explore the science of mind and behavior in our comprehensive Psychology program. Students gain a strong foundation in research methods, cognitive processes, and human development while preparing for careers in mental health, research, or graduate study.

Areas of Focus

  • Clinical Psychology
  • Cognitive Neuroscience
  • Developmental Psychology
  • Social Psychology

values.title: Mechanical Engineering
values.body:
Design, build, and innovate with our ABET-accredited Mechanical Engineering program. From robotics to renewable energy, students learn to solve complex engineering challenges using cutting-edge tools and technologies.

Specializations

  • Robotics and Automation
  • Thermal Systems
  • Manufacturing
  • Aerospace Applications

values.title: English Literature
values.body:
Immerse yourself in the world of literature, from classical texts to contemporary works. Our English Literature program develops critical thinking, analytical writing, and communication skills valued across industries.

Areas of Study

  • British Literature
  • American Literature
  • Creative Writing
  • Literary Theory

values.title: Finance
values.body:
Build expertise in financial markets, investment analysis, and corporate finance. Our Finance program prepares students for careers in banking, investment management, and financial consulting.

Key Topics

  • Investment Analysis
  • Corporate Finance
  • Financial Modeling
  • Risk Management

values.title: Biology
values.body:
Discover the science of life in our comprehensive Biology program. From molecular biology to ecology, students gain hands-on laboratory experience and prepare for careers in healthcare, research, or environmental science.

Tracks

  • Pre-Medical
  • Molecular Biology
  • Ecology and Evolution
  • Biotechnology

values.title: Commencement Ceremony 2026
values.body:
Join us as we celebrate the achievements of the Class of 2026. The ceremony will feature keynote speaker Dr. Maya Chen, Nobel laureate and distinguished alumna.

Tickets are required for guests. Each graduate receives 4 complimentary tickets.

values.title: University Receives $50M Research Grant
values.body:
State University has been awarded a $50 million grant from the National Science Foundation to establish a new Center for Climate Research. The center will bring together scientists from multiple disciplines to study climate change impacts and develop innovative solutions.

"This grant represents a tremendous opportunity to make a real difference in addressing one of the most pressing challenges of our time," said University President Dr. James Williams.

The center is expected to create 100 new research positions and provide funding for 50 graduate fellowships over the next five years.

values.title: State University Ranked in Top 50 Nationally
values.body:
U.S. News & World Report has ranked State University among the top 50 public universities in the nation, up five spots from last year. The ranking recognizes our commitment to academic excellence, research innovation, and student success.

Key factors contributing to the improved ranking include higher graduation rates, increased research funding, and strong alumni giving.

values.title: About State University
values.body:
Founded in 1892, State University has grown from a small agricultural college to a comprehensive research university serving over 15,000 students. Our mission is to advance knowledge, foster creativity, and prepare students to be engaged citizens and leaders in their communities.

Our Values

  • Excellence - We pursue the highest standards in teaching, research, and service.
  • Integrity - We act with honesty and ethical responsibility.
  • Diversity - We embrace diverse perspectives and create an inclusive community.
  • Innovation - We encourage creative thinking and bold ideas.

Accreditation

State University is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission and holds specialized accreditations in engineering, business, nursing, and education.

values.title: Admissions
values.body:
Undergraduate Admissions

We welcome applications from students who demonstrate academic achievement, intellectual curiosity, and a commitment to making a difference. Our holistic review process considers your academic record, standardized test scores (optional), extracurricular activities, and personal essays.

Application Deadlines

  • Early Decision: November 1
  • Regular Decision: January 15
  • Transfer Students: March 1

Graduate Admissions

Graduate program requirements vary by department. Please visit the specific program page for application requirements and deadlines.
